quote: Respect is what we owe; love, what we give.
author: Philip James Bailey

quote: Respect was invented to cover the empty place where love should be.
author: Leo Tolstoy,  Anna Karenina

quote: Respect is tendered with pleasure only where it is not exacted.
author: Anne-Robert-Jacques Turgot,  The Turgot Collection

quote: Respect is not the equivalent to 'liking' a student or teacher; it is the ability to have a high regard for the role of another. In order to receive respect, we should demonstrate it first...
author: Tanya R. Liverman,  Memoirs of an Educarer: An Inspiration for Education

quote: Deeply respecting yourself is the first step toward having a deep respect for others.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: I cannot compromise my respect for your love. You can keep your love, I will keep my respect.
author: Amit Kalantri

quote: The utmost form of respect is to give sincerely of your presence.
author: Mollie Marti

quote: Self-respect permeates every aspect of your life.
author: Joe Clark

quote: Each moment, each person, is sacred and worthy of respect- especially you.
author: Amy Leigh Mercree,  The Spiritual Girl's Guide to Dating: Your Enlightened Path to Love, Sex, & Soul Mates

quote: Self-respect is the root of discipline: The sense of dignity growswith the ability to say no to oneself.
author: Abraham Joshua Heschel

quote: Treat everyone with the sweetness of love and respect.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: When you are content to be simply yourself and don't compare or compete, everyone will respect you.
author: Lao Tzu,  Tao Te Ching

quote: Respect for self is the beginning of cultivating virtue in men and women.
author: Gordon B. Hinckley

quote: You always get more respect when you don't have a happy ending.
author: Julia Quinn

quote: The secret of a happy life is respect. Respect for yourself and respect for others.
author: Ayad Akhtar,  American Dervish

quote: Why do people respect the package rather than the man?
author: Michel de Montaigne,  The Complete Essays

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Chbosky,  The Perks of Being a Wallflower

quote: We accept the love we think we deserve.
author: Stephen Cbosky

quote: If you like someone, you tell the truth because that, to me, is respect. If you hate someone, you tell them the truth because what do you have to lose?
author: Tara Kelly,  Harmonic Feedback

quote: Love, friendship and respect do not unite people as much as a common hatred for something.
author: Anton Chekhov

quote: I respect you as a person too much to respect your ridiculous beliefs.
author: Johann Hari

quote: If you truly want to be respected by people you love, you must prove to them that you can survive without them.
author: Michael Bassey Johnson,  The Infinity Sign

quote: Any person who, with all the sincerity of heart, is in search for God, on land or in the sea, is worthy of respect.
author: Riaz Ahmed Gohar Shahi,  The Religion of God

quote: To respect the dignity of a relationship also implies accepting the end when it comes. Except in my mind, except in my dreams, where the aftertaste of her still lingers.
author: André Brink,  Before I Forget

quote: Self-respect. It would make me lovable. And it's the secret to good sex.
author: Susan Sontag,  As Consciousness is Harnessed to Flesh: Journals and Notebooks, 1964-1980

quote: Give love, take pride
author: Benny Bellamacina,  Piddly poems for children vol:3

quote: We take for granted the very things that most deserve our gratitude.
author: Cynthia Ozick

quote: We learned about gratitude and humility - that so many people had a hand in our success, from the teachers who inspired us to the janitors who kept our school clean... and we were taught to value everyone's contribution and treat everyone with respect.
author: Michelle Obama

quote: I no longer agree to treat myself with disrespect. Every time a self-critical thought comes to mind, I will forgive the Judge and follow this comment with words of praise, self-acceptance, and love.
author: Miguel Ruiz

quote: In order to survive, a plurality of true communities would require not egalitarianism and tolerance but knowledge, an understanding of the necessity of local differences, and respect. Respect, I think, always implies imagination - the ability to see one another, across our inevitable differences, as living souls. (pg. 181, Sex, Economy, Freedom, and Community)
author: Wendell Berry,  The Art of the Commonplace: The Agrarian Essays

quote: You should never be surprised when someone treats you with respect, you should expect it.
author: Sarah Dessen,  Keeping the Moon

quote: And I can fight only for something that I love, love only what I respect, and respect only what I at least know.
author: Adolf Hitler

quote: You honor yourself by acting with dignity and composure.
author: Allan Lokos,  Patience: The Art of Peaceful Living

quote: It is better to be respected than it is to be popular. Popularity ends on yearbook day, but respect lasts forever.
author: John Bytheway

quote: Love and respect all people. Hate and destroy all faith.
author: Penn Jillette,  God, No!: Signs You May Already Be an Atheist and Other Magical Tales

quote: You have had many successes, and you have earned the right to be respected.
author: Lorii Myers,  Targeting Success, Develop the Right Business Attitude to be Successful in the Workplace

quote: Character — the willingness to accept responsibility for one's own life — is the source from which self-respect springs.
author: Joan Didion,  On Self-Respect

quote: You are speaking of my future lover. Be more respectful.
author: Charlaine Harris,  Club Dead

quote: I finally know the difference between pleasing and loving, obeying and respecting. It has taken me so many years to be okay with being different, and with being this alive, this intense. (xxvi)
author: Eve Ensler,  I am an Emotional Creature

quote: In all our deeds, the proper value and respect for time determines success or failure.
author: Malcolm X

quote: The way you give your name to others is a measure of how much you like and respect yourself.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: Obedience is the mother of success and is wedded to safety.
author: Aeschylus

quote: Insecure people play with someone else’s feelings. Secure people respect the feelings of others.
author: Karon Waddell

quote: But really, we also need to learn how to love one another as women. How to appreciate and respect each other.
author: Chaka Khan

quote: To live in peace, love peace.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: If you do not respect your own wishes, no one else will. You will simply attract people who disrespect you as much as you do.
author: Vironika Tugaleva

quote: Reputation is what other people know about you. Honor is what you know about yourself.
author: Lois McMaster Bujold,  A Civil Campaign

quote: You teach people how to treat you.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: Submission is not about authority and it is not obedience; it is all about relationships of love and respect.
author: Wm. Paul Young,  The Shack

quote: Dad needs to show an incredible amount of respect and humor and friendship toward his mate so the kids understand their parents are sexy, they're fun, they do things together, they're best friends. Kids learn by example. If I respect Mom, they're going to respect Mom.
author: Tim Allen
